trans-unit.source: Defines methods for reading the parts of a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 定義方法來讀取的部分<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the color contexts on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面上的所有色彩內容的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that includes every <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> that is on the page.
Gets a collection of all the fonts that are used on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的頁面所使用的所有字型。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that includes every <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> that is on the page.
Gets the color context for the resource that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得具有指定之資源的色彩內容[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref>.
Gets the font that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the font.
The font that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: 有指定之 Uri 的字型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the image that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image.
The image that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之 Uri 的映像。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
Use this method when you do not know the specific type of the resource with the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 您不知道特定的型別與指定的資源時使用這個方法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: When you do know the type, use one of the type-specific methods that is provided by this class.
trans-unit.target: 當您知道型別，請使用其中一種由這個類別提供特定類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource.
The resource that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之 Uri 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource dictionary that has the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the resource dictionary.
The resource dictionary that has the specified Uri.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之 Uri 的資源字典。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the images on the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面上的所有映像的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> that includes every <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> that is on the page.
Gets the page number.
An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the page number.
Gets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>, if a ticket exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>票證存在，與其相關聯，則<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] page, see chapter 2 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>屬於[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]頁面上，請參閱中的第 2 章[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS︰ 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that contains the default printing options for the page; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> exists for the page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>包含頁面的預設列印選項或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>有<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>頁面。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the resource dictionaries for the page.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面的所有資源字典的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> objects.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> part of the markup of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.

For more information about the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments> element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]封裝，請參閱中的第 9 章[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)]規格，您可以在取得[XPS︰ 規格和授權下載](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure"></xref> that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.StoryFragments"></xref> element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] package.
Gets the thumbnail image, if a thumbnail exists, that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得如果縮圖存在，而且相關聯的縮圖影像， <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail"></xref> that represents the image.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref>.
A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the page.
Gets an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> for the page.
An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> for the page.
